title: After coming under fire in the US, TikTok hires local law firm for policy advice
text:
The short video app said its new team of (US) advisors will include two former congressmen and consult with the company on its content management policy and provide legal support. Chinese internet companies have come under scrutiny in the West for data protection policies that are often seen as laxer than more developed countries.
